text.text_translated:
People in Berlin said shooting pigs was not kind.  
They talked a lot with hunters.  
Because of the protests, city leaders stopped shooting the pigs.  
They put up fences to keep pigs out.  
They made a rule that people cannot feed the pigs.  
Their plan may not work.  
Warm winters bring more pigs.  
There are more pigs now than before.

Many people in Berlin said shooting pigs is cruel.  
Hunters and animal lovers had an argument.  
People protested.  
The city council decided a new plan.  
They stopped shooting the pigs.  
They built fences around the pigs.  
They made feeding the pigs illegal.

It may be a hard fight.
